resources.string: Made app compatible with Android 15 and updated support libraries
The app now uses \"edge-to-edge\" display mode on Android 11 and up
Add small delay to showing the keyboard to fix it not showing at all
Add option to close app after starting the search
Removed incorrect change of search bar background color
Use white as app background in light mode again
Made app compatible with Android 14
Added 5 machine-created translations
Use Android 13 language change system
Updated some search providers
Increased min sdk to 21
Added a new dark theme!
Added Metager as a Search engine
Now 3 different customized search engines can be set up
Some little improvements, thanks to tedkotz!
Added Ecosia as a Search engine, because I like their project
Improved the about screen
Fixed the Google search URL
App can now be set up as a search assistant
Search is cleared upon opening the browser
Bug fixes, thanks to julfers!
Added a second transparent widget
Added French translations, thanks to Benjamin Tourrel!
Works now on Android 4, hopefully
Fix for Widget on Android 4 and below
Initial Release
